articles.title: Metsera calls Pfizer threats ‘nonsense’ as rift widens between companies - Endpoints News
articles.description: Pfizer and Novo Nordisk's battle over obesity biotech Metsera is getting ugly.
articles.content:
Pfiz­er and No­vo Nordisks bat­tle over obe­si­ty biotech Met­sera is get­ting ug­ly.

articles.content:
